name: The Outpost Nine: Episode 1
description: The Outpost Nine - Episode 1 is a Visual Novel/Point and Click hybrid game following the small skeleton crew of “The Outpost”, A lonely mining facility set on the small moon “Cobalt Paradise”.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.33 GHz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any with hardware 3D acceleration DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any
